sentences.en: But the old who seems to have in my ear, like a dirge soft, lingering.
sentences.cn: 但好像有谁来老在我耳边轻吟, 似一首轻轻的哀乐, 挥之不去.

sentences.en: Captain, make sure that the band plays a dirge.
sentences.cn: 上尉, 一定让乐队为他们演奏一首表达我们哀思的挽歌.

sentences.en: His songs are full of dirge.
Radiohead is singing a dirge to the record industry.
sentences.cn: ”收音机头”乐队为唱片行业唱响了挽歌.

sentences.en: Reduced the slow effect on Dirge's Plague.
sentences.cn: 减少了瘟疫挽歌的减速效果.

sentences.en: She threw down her basket and intoned a peasant dirge.
sentences.cn: 她撂下菜篮,唱起庄稼人的哀歌.

sentences.en: That the Song of life is a dirge.
The stranger, after listening for a moment, joined in the mournful dirge.
sentences.cn: 听了一会儿后这个陌生人也跟著唱起了悲哀的挽歌.

sentences.en: Time passes like a dirge, white dye alone across the face of the ear.
sentences.cn: 岁月如挽歌般逝去, 划过脸庞独独染白那耳畔的青丝.

trans.tran_en: a slow sad song sung at a funeral
